text: Goncourt is a former commune in the Haute-Marne department in north-eastern France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the commune Bourmont-entre- Meuse-et-Mouzon.Arrêté préfectoral 18 September 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Haute-Marne department ==References== Category:Former communes of Haute-Marne
title: Goncourt, Haute-Marne
